question: The famous Kalpvriksha plan of Madhya Pradesh Government relates to?
option1: breeding in better quality insects for silk.
option3: Rickshaw and Tempo are provided to unemployed youths of schedule caste and tribe to start their own business.
option4: Interest free loan for 10 years to purchase land
answer: breeding in better quality insects for silk.
explanation:
Pawan putra scheme-Rickshaw and Tempo are provided to unemployed youths of schedule caste and tribe to start their own business.
Vasundhara scheme-Interest free loan for 10 years to purchase land. Madhavan Plan for Dairy and development of livestock
